metadata.title: CVE-2024-2947 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Cockpit. Deleting a sosreport with a crafted name viathe Cockpit web interface can lead to a command injection vulnerability,resulting in privilege escalation. This issue affects Cockpit versions 270and newer.

criterions.comment: cockpit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
